attributes.action: Give us (the tax payers) our shares in the banks we have just bought/bailed out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Will the government give us 'the taxpayer', our individual shares which the government have just bought with our money?
What will happen if the share price rises? Our taxes will probably go up at the same rate if not more.
Is this fare?
the forgotton taxpayer!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
